#summary This page contains a list of requirements for the PS deployments web page

= Introduction =

The current cgi script to display perfSONAR services is located 
here: https://dc211.internet2.edu/cgi-bin/perfAdmin/directory.cgi

To make this script more useful, a few things need to be added.

= Details =


Short term useful additions:
 * add last service registration time
 * for MAs, add last data insertion time
 * add some indication of who can access the service( e.g.: public, R&E networks, private)

Longer term useful additions:
 * group/select services by domain, location, etc (e.g.: ESnet services, Europe services, etc.)
